title: error=no contract code at given address
body:
Hi every one, 
My eth is use prysm+geth, and i found my prysm log say ERROR with:

```
[2022-09-26 02:54:24] ERROR powchain: Unable to process past deposit contract logs, perhaps your execution client is not fully synced error=no contract code at given address
[2022-09-26 02:54:36]  INFO blockchain: Called new payload with optimistic block payloadBlockHash=0x5505ddd04433 slot=4778056
[2022-09-26 02:54:36]  INFO blockchain: Called fork choice updated with optimistic block finalizedPayloadBlockHash=0xbff17fc43eed headPayloadBlockHash=0x5505ddd04433 headSlot=4778056
[2022-09-26 02:54:36]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0x245e7595... epoch=149314 finalizedEpoch=149312 finalizedRoot=0x714862c4... slot=4778056
[2022-09-26 02:54:36]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=128 payloadHash=0x5505ddd04433 slot=4778056 syncBitsCount=506 txCount=250
[2022-09-26 02:54:48]  INFO blockchain: Called new payload with optimistic block payloadBlockHash=0x8ec601757d8e slot=4778057
[2022-09-26 02:54:48]  INFO blockchain: Called fork choice updated with optimistic block finalizedPayloadBlockHash=0xbff17fc43eed headPayloadBlockHash=0x8ec601757d8e headSlot=4778057
```
```
[2022-09-26 02:54:24] ERROR powchain: Unable to process past deposit contract logs, perhaps your execution client is not fully synced error=no contract code at given address
```

but my geth is syned finish, below is geth log :

```
Sep 26 02:54:00  geth[6977]: INFO [09-26|02:54:00.464] Forkchoice requested sync to new head    number=15,614,690 hash=61ddb1..e7c79d
Sep 26 02:54:00  geth[6977]: INFO [09-26|02:54:00.606] Imported new block headers               count=1    elapsed="253.617µs" number=15,614,690 hash=61ddb1..e7c79d
Sep 26 02:54:12  geth[6977]: INFO [09-26|02:54:12.595] Forkchoice requested sync to new head    number=15,614,691 hash=457317..d3f43b
Sep 26 02:54:12  geth[6977]: INFO [09-26|02:54:12.610] Imported new block headers               count=1    elapsed="370.2µs"   number=15,614,691 hash=457317..d3f43b
Sep 26 02:54:12  geth[6977]: INFO [09-26|02:54:12.946] State heal in progress                   accounts=45257@2.46MiB    slots=32476@2.57MiB    codes=1664@12.35MiB nodes=12,848,736@3.55GiB pending=59713
Sep 26 02:54:21  geth[6977]: INFO [09-26|02:54:21.849] Downloader queue stats                   receiptTasks=0    blockTasks=0    itemSize=256.83KiB throttle=1021
Sep 26 02:54:23  geth[6977]: INFO [09-26|02:54:23.889] Forkchoice requested sync to new head    number=15,614,692 hash=ae9bef..7edd8b
Sep 26 02:54:24  geth[6977]: INFO [09-26|02:54:24.612] Imported new block headers               count=1    elapsed="204.985µs" number=15,614,692 hash=ae9bef..7edd8b

```

geth is follow the new block number, why prysm say not fully synced,  thank you.

> Sep 26 02:54:12  geth[6977]: INFO [09-26|02:54:12.946] State heal in progress                   accounts=45257@2.46MiB    slots=32476@2.57MiB    codes=1664@12.35MiB nodes=12,848,736@3.55GiB pending=59713

I believe this log is part of the issue. State heal in progress may mean that the state is missing data, such as the deposit contract. From some online searching, this may take 4 hours or more to complete after your initial syncing.
@prestonvanloon yes, you're right!! after many hours, now the log is back normal, thanks a lot.
